title: Ryan Reynolds Hilariously Trolls Hugh Jackman On His Birthday & We Cannot Stop Laughing
text:
How can you not expect Ryan Reynolds to troll anyone and everyone at every opportunity he gets, especially when he doesn’t even spare his wife?! He is the master of trolling!

Twitter

And he proved the same yet again when he wished Hugh Jackman a happy birthday.

Ryan Reynolds never leaves an opportunity to troll Hugh Jackman. It has been years since he has been feuding with him to revive his Wolverine character so they can appear in a movie together. And on his birthday, yet again, he didn’t leave the opportunity to hilariously troll him.

"Hello, Hugh! I was just, uh, I was just going to wish you a happy birthday. Then I saw what you said," he says in the video.

Don't Miss 139 SHARES 346 SHARES 16.9 K SHARES 8.8 K SHARES 2 K SHARES

For the unversed, Hugh at a concert this week had said, "By the way, let's see Ryan Reynolds do that," he quipped and asked the crowd not share his comments online. "Don't post that. Do not post that. I'll have like three million tweets from him in the next ten seconds."

"In a word? Hurtful," Ryan said and added, "Yeah. Enjoy the show," as he walked away. But he returns!

After he sings "Happy Birthday,” he trolls him. "I'm not even fucking professionally trained, Jackman. You piece of shit, motherfucker," he jokes.

When you’re trying to record a heartfelt birthday message .... but are interrupted by the least greatest showman. @VancityReynolds pic.twitter.com/RwlE4IXFX1 — Hugh Jackman (@RealHughJackman) April 27, 2018

We love how they both troll each other, don’t we?
